participant_1.name: Charlie
participant_1.personality: Curious and imaginative, loves to explore new ideas.
participant_1.background: when i grow up i want to be a dog. i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i like to eat chocolate candy. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Confident and stylish, enjoys the finer things in life.
participant_2.background: i like to tan in tanning beds. i love spending money. i am high maintenance. i diet a lot. i love listening to britney spears.
